about_the_game:
Churchward authorised the first toplight build in 1905, from 1907 they were built in large numbers. These two sets (57ft and 70ft) represent the earlier toplights with full panelling in the 1922 livery. The 57ft stock was used all over the GW system, while the 70ft stock (built to the extremes of the loading gauge) were used on services mainly starting from Paddington.

The GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 02 for TS Marketplace includes the following coach types:

  • Dia C29 Full Third (Bars 1)
  • Dia C29 Full Third (Bars 2)
  • Dia D51 Brake Third (Left Hand)
  • Dia D51 Brake Third (Right Hand)
  • Dia E93 Composite (Left Hand)
  • Dia E93 Composite (Right Hand)
  • Dia M11 TPO Stowage Car / Full Brake

These two sets (57ft and 70ft) represent the earlier toplights with full panelling in the 1922 livery. The 57ft stock was used all over the GW system, while the 70ft stock (built to the extremes of the loading gauge) were used on services mainly starting from Paddington.

The GWR Churchward Panelled Toplights Pack 02 for TS Marketplace includes the following coach types:
